What are the two main ways to mine Verus?

The two main ways to mine Verus are solo mining and pool mining. Solo mining allows you to mine through Verus Desktop and receive full block rewards, but it may take a while to win a block depending on your hashrate. Pool mining, on the other hand, allows you to participate in a pool and receive regular rewards, but it requires setting up a few things before you can start.

--- sidebarDepth: 2 ---# Mining## Solo vs Pool Mining### Solo MiningMine solo through Verus Desktop to receive full block rewards. Depending on hashrate it may take a while before winning a block. No additional software is needed to get started.### Pool MiningParticipate in pool mining to receive regular rewards. You will need to set up a few things before you can start.---Quick Comparison | | Solo mining | Pool mining | | -----------------------: | :--: | :----------: | | **Full Node** | yes | no | | **Regular Rewards** | no | yes | | **Setup Difficulty** | easy | intermediate |## Suitable DevicesMine Verus with various devices. Profitability **indication** means the electricity usage vs hashrate.| Device | Profitability Indication | | :------------------ | :-----------------------------------------: | | CPU (processor) | high | | GPU (graphics card) | medium | | Mobile Phone | high | | ARM (not RP4) | high | | FPGA | not possible | | ASIC | not possible |::: tip Hashrate Comparison Compare hashrates from different devices. See [Community Reported Hashrates](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RrSYJDV0Mjj3X-myMC3aQDGkcipivxHsD7ZxJ3r5f_A/edit#gid=10943314) :::## Mining Software ::: warning Need help with mining? ⛏️ [Go to the Verus Discord #mining channel. What are the main differences between solo mining and pool mining?

The main differences between solo mining and pool mining are:

* Solo mining requires a full node, while pool mining does not.
* Solo mining does not provide regular rewards, while pool mining does.
* Solo mining is easy to set up, while pool mining requires intermediate setup difficulty.

What devices are suitable for mining Verus, and how profitable are they?

The devices suitable for mining Verus, along with their profitability indications, are:

* CPU (processor): high profitability
* GPU (graphics card): medium profitability
* Mobile Phone: high profitability
* ARM (not RP4): high profitability
* FPGA: not possible
* ASIC: not possible

What software can I use to mine Verus with a CPU (processor)?
You can use CCminer software to mine Verus with a CPU (processor) on Windows, Linux, and ARM devices. The download links and versions are available in the documentation.

Can I mine Verus with my mobile phone?
Yes, you can mine Verus with your mobile phone using the VerusMiner software, which can be downloaded from [here](https://pangz-lab.github.io/verusminer/).
